article_title: American Legion to host hep-C testing
article_text:
Plattsburgh, NY (12901)

Today

Mostly cloudy early with scattered thunderstorms developing this afternoon. High 86F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%..

Tonight

Isolated thunderstorms this evening. Skies will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

article_metadata.author: ASHLEIGH LIVINGSTON Press-Republican

og.description: Post 1619 in Morrisonville covering cost of test kits for veterans.
